channel.title: Installation on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Faceted search module - Upgrade module
item.description: Faceted search module - Upgrade module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_facetedsearch The module page list should be displayed and Faceted search module should be displayed on the list Click on the button at the right of the module > Choose on the list “Upgrade” option A modal is open with:

item.title: Faceted search module - Uninstall/Install module
item.description: Faceted search module - Uninstall/Install module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_facetedsearch The module page list should be displayed and Faceted search module should be displayed on the list Click on the button at the right of the module > Choose on the list “Uninstall” option A modal is open with:

item.title: Faceted search module - Disable/Enable module
item.description: Faceted search module - Disable/Enable module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_facetedsearch The module page list should be displayed and Faceted search module should be displayed on the list Click on the button at the right of the module > Choose on the list “Disable” option A modal is open with:

item.title: Faceted search module - Uninstall and delete module
item.description: Faceted search module - Uninstall and delete module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_facetedsearch The module page list should be displayed and Faceted search module should be displayed on the list Click on the button at the right of the module > Choose on the list “Uninstall” option A modal is open with:

item.title: Faceted search module - Disable Mobile/Enable Mobile module
item.description: Faceted search module - Disable Mobile/Enable Mobile module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_facetedsearch The module page list should be displayed and Faceted search module should be displayed on the list Click on the button at the right of the module > Choose on the list “Disable Mobile” option * After loading, a green message “Disable mobile action on module ps_facetedsearch succeeded.

item.title: Faceted search module - Reset module
item.description: Faceted search module - Reset module Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_facetedsearch The module page list should be displayed and Faceted search module should be displayed on the list Click on the button at the right of the module > Choose on the list “Reset” option A modal is open with:
